Package com.panviva.util.pgc.dom.processing

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IDevolutionCondition  
    IPartitioner  
    IPartitionType
    Interface for the Partition Type
    ITransform
    This interface defines the methods required to execute and adjust transforms.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DocumentPartitioner
    This derived class performs document specific attuned partitioning of an xHtml document.
    FolderPartitioner
    This derived class performs folder specific attuned partitioning of an xHtml document.
    Partition
    Base class defining the core identifiers for a partition.
    Partitioner
    Abstract class implementing partitioning executed under the umbrella of a transform.
    SectionPartitioner
    This derived class performs section specific attuned partitioning of an xHtml document.
    TaskPartitioner
    This derived class performs task specific attuned partitioning of an xHtml document.
    TransformationManager  
    Transformer
    This class is an abstract implementation of the ITransform interface.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    DevolutionCondition  
    PartitionType  
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    PartitionException
    Convenience class for throwing partition level exceptions.
    TransformException
    Convenience class for throwing TRansform exceptions.
